title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Pipistrel Virus SW121 - autopilot
description:
In this how to we are going to look how we to use the autopilot in a Pipistrel Virus SW 121.

We will depart from Las Heras Airport 
(SAVH) Runway 27 and make a small flight where we will use the autopilot functionalities.
